column2: message boards are a place where users can go to freely share their thoughts and ideas about the PlayStation brand. A Sony Entertainment Network account is required to contribute to these message boards. We prohibit message board participants from disclosing their own personally identifying information other than their own Online IDs.
He or she can use that email address and password to access his or her account, review the information in his or her profile, edit or delete his or her profile at any time.
